RelatedSentence: , May 19 , 2014 / PRNewswire / --  Gainesville attorneys , Avera & Smith , LLP , announce the receipt of a $ 664,328.42 verdict , awarded in the Circuit Court of Alachua County , Florida on May 6 , 2014 .

A0: Lance Avera , partner at Avera & Smith
RelatedSentence: Lance Avera , partner at Avera & Smith , represented Plaintiff , L'Tonya Johnson , for injuries sustained in a motor vehicle crash with Defendant , Jeremy Wilson , who was working for Defendant Southeastern Building Services , Inc .
